front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Functioning of and Interfaces Among Propulsion, Friction Brake, and Train-borne Master Control on Rail Rapid Transit Vehicles
front.abstract: The interfaces between and among functional systems on rail 1 rapid transit vehicles are prescribed. The systems themselves are treated as "black boxes;" requirements for the input signals and the output response are given. For each category of interface, three types are listed in increasing technical sophistication.
